column1: Age at release and most serious commitment offense

Note: Prisoners were tracked for 5 years following release. Inmates could have been in prison for more than one offense; the most serious one is reported in this table. Data on prisoner’s age were known for 100% of cases. See appendix table 15 for standard errors.
*Includes 0.8% of cases in which the prisoner’s most serious offense was unspecified.
